WorkItem.Description:
Rawr mage is currently not working.
 
I have tried the following combination of methods and all have resulted in errors being thrown when trying to run optimisations and upgrade lists:
 
Exporting character from in game addon - adding it to rawr online and rawr downloaded exe - run optimise / upgrade (ERROR THROWN)
Add character from battlenet to rawr online and rawr downloaded exe - run optimise / upgrade (ERROR THROWN)
Start a new character - add in the most basic detail (char name, race, server, professions, spec and raid buffs) - run upgrade list (ERROR THROWN)
 
 
I also tried resetting the item cache and all caches as part of the above methods as instructed on the FAQ's and same result
 
Confirmed installed silverlight version 4.  I ran the online checks with IE7, IE8, Firefox and google chrome all same ERROR THROWN
 
I did scroll through the list of currently open items and did not find any for this so added it here so the developers are aware
 
Thanks

Comments.Message: Well for start it would help if you told us which character you're trying to load and what error you're getting.

The character I am loading by battlenet and rawr addon is:  EU - Kilrogg - Fishnuts (Mage)

When loading from the rawr in game addon export and then running optimise the following error screen is presented Copied from clipboard on error screen)

I have performed the Suggested Fix and continue to receive this error. If I am posting this message without having performed the Suggested Fix I am aware that I am consuming the Developer(s) time in managing my Issue unnecessarily.

== Version: 4.2.0.0 ==

== Error Message ==
[Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException]
Arguments: 
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.60531.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException

== StackTrace ==
   at Rawr.RandomSuffix.GetStatValue(Item item, Int32 id, AdditiveStat stat)
   at Rawr.Reforging.GetReforgingOptions(Item baseItem, Int32 randomSuffixId, AdditiveStat[] reforgeStatsFrom, AdditiveStat[] reforgeStatsTo)
   at Rawr.CalculationsBase.GetReforgingOptions(Item baseItem, Int32 randomSuffixId)
   at Rawr.Optimizer.AvailableItemGenerator.GetPossibleGemmedItemsForItem(Item item, Int32 randomSuffixId, String gemmedId, ItemAvailabilityInformation availability)
   at Rawr.Optimizer.AvailableItemGenerator.PopulateAvailableIds(Boolean positiveCostItemsAvailable)
   at Rawr.Optimizer.AvailableItemGenerator..ctor(List`1 availableItems, Boolean generateDirectUpgrades, Boolean templateGemsEnabled, Boolean overrideRegem, Boolean overrideReenchant, Boolean overrideReforge, Boolean slotFiltering, Boolean positiveCostItemsAvailable, Character[] characters, CalculationsBase[] models)
   at Rawr.Optimizer.ItemInstanceOptimizer.InitializeItemCache(Character character, List`1 availableItems, Boolean overrideRegem, Boolean overrideReenchant, Boolean overrideReforge, Boolean templateGemsEnabled, CalculationsBase model, Boolean optimizeFood, Boolean optimizeElixirs, Boolean mixology, List`1 talentSpecs, Boolean mutateTalents, Boolean mutateGlyphs, Boolean positiveCostItemsAvailable)
   at Rawr.UI.OptimizeWindow.OptimizeButton_Click(Object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnClick()
   at System.Windows.Controls.Button.OnClick()
   at System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonUp(MouseButtonEventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnMouseLeftButtonUp(Control ctrl, EventArgs e)
   at MS.Internal.JoltHelper.FireEvent(IntPtr unmanagedObj, IntPtr unmanagedObjArgs, Int32 argsTypeIndex, Int32 actualArgsTypeIndex, String eventName)

== These are the Steps that I have tried ==
[Please fill in steps here]
Try version 4.2.1. I don't get any error when I load your character and try to optimize it.
I will downloaded the 4.2.1 WPF version and try it now

4.2.1 WPF version is now working

Thanks
Online version is still not working
Make sure to reset the item cache.
